info.name: Inoreader NO ADS - new card view
info.description:
Inoreader new Big card view with 4 tiles on any screen resolution. No ADS at all.

IMPORTANT DON`T USE ADBLOCK, ADS will be removed by css styles!!!

changelog:
fixed padding in list view
fixed issue with list and other type of view
info.additionalInfo: Fix issue with invisible ADS banner at right side at the card view
